definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: It's there , between the video arcade and the post office.
sentences.chinese: 它在那兒，在電子遊戲中心與郵局之間。

sentences.english: The five boys who came to play video games reshuffled everything.
sentences.chinese: 五個去玩電子遊戲的男孩讓羅斯家面目一新。

sentences.english: They might be fun, but they can take up way too much time.
sentences.chinese: 電子遊戲可能挺好玩，但是會佔用你很多時間。

sentences.english: Okuni as a character in the Koei video game Samurai Warriors.
sentences.chinese: 阿國是光榮公司的電子遊戲《戰國無雙》中的角色。

sentences.english: You should cut down on video games if you don't want to fail the exams.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想通過考試，就應少玩電子遊戲。

sentences.english: Children who play video games well must be quick with their hands and sharp-sighted.
sentences.chinese: 能熟練玩電子遊戲的孩子必須眼疾手快。

sentences.english: Can you tell us about the video games that you play?
sentences.chinese: 你能跟我們講講你玩的電子遊戲嗎？

sentences.english: There is a video arcade between the New Street and the Bridge Street.
sentences.chinese: 在新街和大橋街中間有一個電子遊戲中心。

sentences.english: Poker-playing managers will be used to asking, 'did I play that right?
sentences.chinese: 電子遊戲的第二個問題，是沒有作品拿出來。

sentences.english: There are even mascots for video games so the uses are limitless.
sentences.chinese: 甚至有吉祥物用於電子遊戲所以它們的用途不可限量。

sentences.english: I wonder how much those video games cost.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道那些電子遊戲多少錢。

sentences.english: They recommend watching video games and talking with children about the appropriateness of the content.
sentences.chinese: 他們建議看電子遊戲並與孩子們談論遊戲內容的尺度。

sentences.english: He loved the same kungfu movies and video games as other boys.
sentences.chinese: 和其他同齡人一樣，他也喜歡武打片和電子遊戲。
電子遊戲毀了我的生活。

sentences.english: So did Mr Kotick and the industry grow up together?
sentences.chinese: 科迪克是否和電子遊戲這一產業共同成長呢？

definition: to run neck and neck/to keep pace with/to keep abreast of/on a par with one another
